identity.name: AdhesiveFlow ERP
principles: Density with Clarity: High data density, but distinct hierarchy.
Safety Orange Actions: Use orange for primary actions to mimic industrial safety cues.
Technical Borders: Use visible grid lines and borders to separate data.
Contextual AI: AI insights appear as 'Heads-Up Display' overlays, not intrusive popups.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on orange backgrounds is white or dark slate depending on shade. Use APCA checks.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (orange-500) on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings to give a distinct industrial look.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the main dashboard.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all SKU codes, prices, and inventory counts.
Ensure the sidebar is collapsible to maximize data view area.
Use the provided Pexels images for the login page and dashboard widgets.
Apply 'Safety Orange' (#f97316) sparingly for primary actions and critical alerts only.
Use 'Slate-900' for the sidebar to create a strong anchor.
For tables, use the 'dense' style with sticky headers.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Avoid 'AI slop' - make the design feel intentional and crafted.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical for 'breathing room' in non-data-dense areas.
Prioritize Shadcn components but customize them to match the 'Industrial Precision' theme.
